original_title: Faszination Natur - The Most Spectacular Landscapes
overview: The miracle of life. The warm rays of the sun pierce the blue planet, filling it with light and colors. Shades of dazzling whiteness of snow, the bright green plants, warm yellow and purple ground, boundless colorful variety of flowers and animals, deep blue seas and skies - all turned our world into an endless game of colors, shadows and light.
title: Faszination Natur - The Most Spectacular Landscapes
